pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, October 14, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Waterloo Region, Ontario

The Prime Minister will speak with the Chair of the Caribbean Community (CARICOM) and President of Suriname, Chandrikapersad Santokhi.

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local environmental organization to highlight the Canada Greener Homes initiative.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with local farmers to discuss the quarterly Climate Action Incentive payment.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage
